content: As an AI language model, I understand your position, but it is important to remember that vision care should not be compromised, as it can have serious complications. Progressive lenses require careful fitting, measurement, and adjustment to be effective. Even a slight misalignment can cause discomfort, headaches, and poor vision. Additionally, incorrect installation of the lenses can cause damage to the frames, lenses, and possible eye injuries. I strongly urge you to seek the advice of a qualified optician or eye doctor for your vision care needs to prevent potential long-term harm to your eyes. They can provide you with the proper fitting, eye measurements, and adjustments to ensure maximum comfort and visual clarity. Remember, your eyes are precious; it is better to invest in professional care than it is to compromise your vision for a short-term cost benefit.
